description.narrative: Support the implementation of key interventions from the Multisectoral Action for the Reduction of Chronic Undernutrition (PAMRDC), including strengthening INAS' capacity on nutrition, introducing interventions to improve the nutritional and health status of adolescents and activities in specific districts, which contributes to Community-Based Management Of Acute Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: HEALTH - Vulnerable children and their families have access to, and make use of, quality promotive, preventive and curative health, nutrition and HIV services.
